APP_TITLE: What would you like to do?
CERRAR_SESION_CONFIRM: Do you want to log out?
PRODUCT_QUESTION: What would you like to do with the product?
START_VOICE_RECOG: Speak now to give a command
CATEGORY_PROMPT: Please state the category you wish to operate in: Frozen, Fresh, Cleaning, Dry
WEB_SPEECH: Web Speech API is not available in this browser.
CAMERA_ON: Camera activated. You can now scan a code.
NO_CAMERA: You do not have permission to access the camera.
QR_DETECTED: QR code detected. Would you like to add, remove, or delete the product?
CANCEL_OPERATION_CONFIRM: Are you sure you want to cancel the operation?
ERROR_UPDATE_QUANTITY: Error updating the quantity. Please try again later.
ERROR_RETRIEVE_QUANTITY: Error withdrawing the quantity. Please try again later.
ENTER_ESTABLISHMENT_NAME: Enter the name of the establishment:
CONFIRM_DELETE_PRODUCT: Are you sure you want to delete this product?
CONFIRM_DATABASE_CHANGE: Do you want to switch databases? (OK to switch, Cancel to stay in the current one)
CONFIRM_LOGOUT: Do you want to log out?
UNKNOWN_LOGOUT_ERROR: Error logging out: An unknown error occurred.
LOGIN_ERROR: Incorrect username or password. Please try again.
USER_NOT_FOUND: Incorrect username. Please check your username.
WRONG_PASSWORD: Incorrect password. Please check your password.
LOGIN_FAILED_MESSAGE: Username or password is incorrect. Please check your details and try again.
NAME: Name
HELP_PRIMARY_EMAIL: Primary email is required if there is more than one user in the household.
INVALID_PASSWORD: Password must be at least 9 characters long, include at least one uppercase letter, and one special character
VALID_EMAIL: Please enter a valid email address.
EMAIL_PRINCIPAL_NOT_FOUND: If shared with another person and they already have an account, insert their email
EMPTY_DOB: Date of birth cannot be empty.
INCOMPLETE_DOB: Date of birth is incomplete. Please provide day, month, and year.
INVALID_DOB: The provided date of birth is not valid.
AGE_REQUIREMENT_NOT_MET: You must be at least 10 years old to register.
ALERT_EMAIL_PRINCIPAL_NOT_FOUND: The principal email field is empty. Please provide it.
CREATE_USER_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE: Do you want to create the user {{username}} to manage the database?
RESET_EMAIL_FAILED: Failed to send password reset email.
ENTER_EMAIL_OR_USERNAME: Please enter your email or username.
CONFIRM_PASSWORD_RESET: Are you sure you want to reset your password?
SEND_EMAIL_CONFIRMATION: An email has been sent to {{email}} to change your password.
MUST_UPLOAD_IMAGE: You must upload an image before processing the ticket.
TICKET_PROCESSING_ERROR: The ticket could not be processed. Please try again.
ESTABLISHMENT_DETECTED: The establishment was correctly detected as
TICKET_READ_ERROR: The ticket cannot be read correctly, please upload an image again.
PROCESS_COMPLETED_SUCCESS: The process has been successfully completed. Have been uploaded.
ONLY_IMAGE: The program only accepts images, please take a screenshot of the PDF or document you are trying to upload.
